name: YelpCamp
description: YelpCamp is a fictional campground info and review web app built with NodeJS, Express and MongoDB

name: Beats'N'Vibes
description: Beats'N'Vibes is a fictional DJ blog built using GatsbyJS, GraphQL and data sourced from Contentful CMS

name: Sneakersseur
description: Sneakersseur is a sneaker news website built with GatsbyJS, ReactJS, GraphQL and Markdown files

name: COVID-19 Tracker
description: COVID-19 Tracker displays the latest global and country cases. It is built with NextJS with data from a REST API

name: Amour Essentials
description: Amour Essentials is an e-commerce landing page built with NextJS and powered by Strapi and Cloudinary

name: Tritan Group
description: Tritan Group's company website and job board is built with NextJS content powered by Strapi
